type: GS-13 - NATURAL GAS METERS AND SEALS
description: procurement of natural gas meters and gaskets for the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer: W6897-24CS01 Natural Gas Meters and Seals

#### Key Information

| Information | English | French |
|-----------|-------|--------|
| Reference Number | WS4273873120 | WS4273873120 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4273873120 | WS4273873120 |
| Publication Date | 2023-12-07 | 2023-12-07 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-12-22T14:00:00 | 2023-12-22T14:00:00 |

#### Contract Details

* The Department of National Defence is seeking Standing Offers for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of Natural Gas Meters and Seals from qualified contractors.
* The term of the Standing Offer will commence January 1, 2024 and end on December 28, 2024.
* Deliveries are required on an as-and-when basis to Canadian Forces Base Suffield, Ralston, Alberta.
* The estimated value of the Standing Offer over the term is approximately ($ in millions).

#### Selection Criteria

* Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

* For more information, please contact: Matthew Havrilenko, email [matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Procurement Essentials

* Procurement Category: Goods.
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta.

Note that all information is available on the Canada Buys contract database.

That is it! I'll be keeping an eye on any and all feedback! Thank you in advance. 1
